headline: Wolfe Research Upgrades Target (TGT) Ahead of March Investor Day
summary: Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT) is included among the 13 Best February Dividend Stocks to Buy. On January 27, Wolfe Research raised its view on Target Corporation (NYSE:TGT), upgrading the stock to Peer Perform from Underperform ahead of the retailer’s investor day scheduled for March 3. The firm did not assign a price target but said Target […]

headline: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
summary: The S&P 500 fell Thursday, dragged down by a slide in Microsoft. Software stocks also sold off, fueled by fears that AI could threaten those businesses.

headline: Patagonia Urges Lawmakers to Vote Against Further ICE Funding
summary: The outdoor apparel company, known for its environmental and political advocacy efforts, sent letters this week to senators in California, Colorado, Virginia and other states.  ICE funding has enabled a “pattern of violence” that disproportionately harms vulnerable communities, Gellert wrote.

headline: Dollar General makes key move Target, Walmart can't beat
summary: Presence is everything. Just as it does in personal relationships, presence plays a major role in business. Especially for retailers.
